h2_title: How to Find the Giant Shigandang
content: Go to the clearing behind where you fought the Son of Stones, just off to the left. You'll see some water, a large rock to the left of it, and two golden trees on either side of the rock. You want to go to the right of the water to find the secret area that will take you to the hidden boss.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Giant_Shigandang.md', within the main section titled 'Giant Shigandang', specifically from the subsection 'How to Find the Giant Shigandang'.
The content is as follows:
Go to the clearing behind where you fought the Son of Stones, just off to the left. You'll see some water, a large rock to the left of it, and two golden trees on either side of the rock. You want to go to the right of the water to find the secret area that will take you to the hidden boss.
